text: Learning Stream and its customers -- information is used only by organizations hosting events using learningstream.com.
If you are within the EU and you complete a Learning Stream form, you are transferring data to a third country (U.S.A.).

How long we retain your data
Learning Stream's customers use the software to collect information from registrants for purposes of training, classes, meetings, and other events.
We process this information as part of binding agreements with our customers who then offer their services to their customers (employees, customers, or to the general public).
